com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator

Class PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl
      • com.misc.common.moplaf.propagator.PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Adapter.Internal

    public class PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager
extends org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl
    An adapter that maintains itself as an adapter for all contained objects as they come and go. It can be installed for an EObject, a Resource, or a ResourceSet.

    Add and remove PropagatorFunctionAdapters for ObjectWithPropagatorFunctionAdapter

    The PropagatorFunctionAdapterManager is added when the listening must begin, that is when derived elements must be maintained. This is typically just after the objects are retrieved from their persistent storage (both primitive and derived elements), so after the Resource is loaded. In the EMF generated editor, this will be in the createModel method.

    Handle the management of the PropagatorFunctionAdapters of the Notifiers in the containment tree. Implement specific behaviors at the following moments:

    • when the adapter is added: onAdapterAdded(Notifier)
      • call the Notifiers's addPropagatorFunctionAdapter ObjectWithPropagatorFunctionAdapter.addPropagatorFunctionAdapter()
      • call the propagator's addPropagatorFunctionAdapters PropagatorAbstractAdapter.addPropagatorFunctionAdapters()
    • when the adapter is removed: onAdapterRemoved(Notifier)
      • call the propagator's disposePropagatorFunctionAdapters PropagatorAbstractAdapter.disposePropagatorFunctionAdapters()
      • remove the untouched propagators
    • when the Notifier is added: onNotifierContained(Notifier)
      • touch the propagators that are touch on owned PropagatorFunctionAdapter.isTouchOnOwned()
    • when the Notifier is removed: onNotifierNotContained(Notifier)
      • touch the propagators that are touch on dispose PropagatorFunctionAdapter.isTouchOnDispose()
    • when the Notifier is proxy resolved: onResolve(Notifier, Notifier)
      • move the dependency adapters from the proxy to the resolved object PropagatorDependencyAdapter
